title: An FBI Whistleblower Makes A Stunning Claim (Ep 1873)
description:
In this episode, I address the breaking news from an FBI whistleblower about an unconstitutional attack on free speech. 

News Picks:

Now they’re coming for Elon.

Techo Fog’s update on day three of the Danchenko trial. 

Inflation is exploding again.


Kanye West gets canceled by a major bank. 

The growing threat of zero-click spyware.


The education system is collapsing.
